abstract: The Avis Budget Group on Wednesday unveiled a $1.3 billion cash-and-stock offer for the Dollar Thrifty Automotive Group, topping an earlier bid by Hertz Global Holdings.
snippet: The Avis Budget Group on Wednesday unveiled a $1.3 billion cash-and-stock offer for the Dollar Thrifty Automotive Group, topping an earlier bid by Hertz Global Holdings.
lead_paragraph: 8:32 p.m. | Updated with Dollar Thrifty’s response — The New York Times has more. The Avis Budget Group on Wednesday unveiled a $1.3 billion cash-and-stock offer for the Dollar Thrifty Automotive Group, topping an earlier bid by Hertz Global Holdings.

headline.main: Avis Bids $1.3 Billion for Dollar Thrifty

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
